text: Barbara Cloutman (later Barbara Kent; December 16, 1907 â€“ October 13, 2011) was a Canadian-born and American-based actress of the 1920s and 1930s. She played Lotus in Chinatown after Dark. She played Amelia in the movie Vanity Fair (1932). Kent was born in Alberta, Canada. She died at 103 in Palm Desert, California. == References == Category:Actors from Alberta Category:American centenarians Category:American movie actors Category:1907 births Category:2011 deaths Category:People from Palm Desert, California
title: Barbara Kent
